sentences.en: Such black holes regularly chomp up stars, and that produces a lot of radiation.
sentences.cn: 这样的黑洞会很有规律地吞噬恒星, 也会在这过程中制造出大量的射线.

sentences.en: The panda eats bamboo. Chomp , chomp , chew, yum my bamboo.
sentences.cn: 熊猫吃竹子. 咯, 太美味了, 我的竹子.

sentences.en: They just chomp on tundra, nap a few hours and feast again.
sentences.cn: 它们只是在苔原上大嚼特嚼, 睡上几小时,接着再吃.

sentences.en: We really annoyed when foreigners try to chomp on chicken feet.
sentences.cn: 我们真的很讨厌外国人咬鸡爪子时的样子.

words.tran_cn: 格格地咬牙，咬响牙齿；切齿

trans.tran_cn: 大声地咀嚼, 反复咀嚼
切齿，格格地咬牙，咬响牙齿
